function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tinkering with the demand and supply chain may lead to compromised productive capacity","Impact":"Reduced ability to meet customer demand and potential supply chain disruptions","Mitigation":"Implement robust capacity planning and supply chain management practices","Technologies":"Supply chain management software and demand forecasting tools","People":"Supply chain managers, logistics teams, and vulnerable customers","Owner":"Supply chain managers, logistics teams"},{"Description":"Exclusive shopping hours for vulnerable customers may not effectively minimize out-of-stock situations","Impact":"Disappointment and frustration for vulnerable customers","Mitigation":"Implement real-time inventory management and restocking strategies","Technologies":"Inventory management systems and real-time monitoring tools","People":"Vulnerable customers, e-commerce platform managers","Owner":"E-commerce platform managers"},{"Description":"Service firms may struggle to create new meaning for customers during shelter at home orders","Impact":"Decreased customer engagement and satisfaction, potential loss of business","Mitigation":"Develop innovative and personalized home-based service offerings","Technologies":"Live streaming platforms (Zoom, Webex), fitness tracking apps, and virtual reality tools","People":"Service firm managers, customers","Owner":"Service firm managers"}]}
